education.degree: College of Computing and Software Engineering, M.S. Computer Science
College of the Arts, B.M. Music Performance

work.description: Worked with two other interns to design and implement a web application for internal use at UPS. Gathered requirements from the business team, assigned work amongst ourselves, and produced a working prototype which was well received by senior leadership.

Continued development of the web application I started working on as an intern, eventually deploying it into production. Fixed bugs and added features in preparation for a global release of the web application which will result in it being used by thousands of UPS employees.

projects.name: clang-sys
projects.description: Provides a set of Rust bindings to libclang, the C API for the Clang compiler.

projects.name: clang-rs
projects.blurb: A somewhat idiomatic Rust wrapper for libclang.
projects.description: Provides an easier-to-use wrapper around the raw C API exposed by clang-sys.

projects.name: accelerando
projects.blurb: A C++17 testing and benchmarking library.
projects.description: Provides simple and powerful mechanisms for writing tests and benchmarks.
